1.content:
Lalia sat at a table. The beautiful girl had red hair, reaching down to her shoulders. She had blue eyes, which no man could resist and was about 180 centimeters tall. She naturally had a slim, but curvy figure. This day she wore a blue dress with a plugging neckline, that displayed her large f-cup boobs. Lalia sat down on a table, to write a letter to her roommate Jane. "Jane, I couldn't get my reading done, so I'm going somewhere that's better for concentration. I'll be back in a week, in time for finals. Oh yeah, and I'll need a ride! Thanks in advance!" She took a pink sun hat from the shelf. "All right! Time to weigh anchor and get the ship sailing!", she screamed.

A few hours later she broke through a door. Her blue dress which had been sitting loose on her before, was now stretched to it's limit. Her belly was really big and round, sticking out about one and a half meter from her torso, which made her look like she was nine month pregnant, having triplet's. "Just have to get out of port", she thought to herself, while she tried to squeeze her belly through a door that was way to tight. When she moved through it, it cracked, and with a SLOSH she landed in the room. On the other side of the door, there were waiting three little men, which all wore grey trousers and pink shirts. "Ahoi miss. Were are your personal concierge agents? We trust that the lady can present 100 tickets, so we can get underway", one of them said. "Hm who are...", Lalia stopped. She showed them her tickets. "Assuming you can help a very full lady to her feet", she replied. "Ah so we take it you already had breakfast?", one of them asked. Two of the men took a cloth to help her carry her big belly, while one took her stuff. "Mmm, I'm propably carrying enough breakfast with me too feed the entire ship", she replied, pointing at her belly. "Perhaps lunch than?", the man asked. Lalia smiled. "I like the way you think", she said. Her belly wobbled, while the two men carried it.
1.title: The beginning

11.content:
Lalia was facing up to a tall brown heared man, with dark skin. He wore a red suit and a black shirt. "Delighted to make you acquaintace. My name is E. Most people call me Mr. E", her said grinning. Than he kissed the red-heads hand. "Oh a mysterious man. How very classic", said Lalia. "I am the director of passenger plenitude", he announced himself. "The preservation of your pleasure is my sacred duty", he said, kissing Lalia's hand. "My pleasure?", Lalia was cofused. "You mean whatever floats my boat, you're about?", she asked, while her overstuffed belly hung down to the floor, bouncing with every move. "Precisely. Were we are going, all your desires will be answered", Mr. E replied. "Ensuring that is my job, and my talent." "Such interesting work", said Lalia. "But if you're so good, tell me what's my desire?", the red head asked. "Since you asked, I would guess you have an oral fixation", said the man, holding a tray full of little cakes in his hands. Lalia pulled out a lipstick. "Tsk! This dress gives away every little bulge", she said. "But you like this tight feeling, don't you?", the man asked, and yet he knew the answer. "Hm. Well I...", Lalia didn't know what to do. "I want to know your taste. Choose one please", he said, holding the tray in front of the girl. "I get it", thought Lalia. "This is like a personality test", said Lalia, picking a donut, and putting it into her mouth. "Something like this", Mr M answered.

"May I have another pastry?" asked Lalia, after she had finished the first one with one bite. "I guess that's against the rules. Yo made you choice. Any more would invalidate the experiment", Mr. E answered. "Hm but you haven't even told me what the experiment means. And I still have room", Lalia said, caressing her belly. "I have no self control", she screamed, and with that, she cleaned the whole plate, her boobs resting in Mr. E lap. "I got to have everything. Making me bigger. Dress tighter. Sloshing inside me!" She stopped. "I guess I ruined the experiment. That wasn't very lady-like", she mumbled. "Actually the results are quite clear", said Mr. E smiling. "You are a Thunderous glutton." "Haha. Could have told you that before", laughed Lalia, pointing at her belly, that was now resting heavily on the floor.
11.title: The mysterious Mr. E

111.content:
Before her journey had begun, Lalia had weighed around 170 lbs. Which meant she wasn't slim, but only a little plump, because of her height of 180 centimeters. Now Lalia laied in a big red bed. It was eight o' clock, on a morning like every other. "Good morning my perfect world", she shouted, throughing away her bedspread. In only those few days, quite a change had come over her body. She wore a very tight, golden chemise, which was nearly covering her butt, and which had an extremely large cleavage. Her arms and face had stayed as before, but her butt had grown, making it into the ghetto-booty region. Even on an empty stomach, she now had a slight bulge on her tummy. Her tits had grown a perfectly shaped, full H-cup. She must have weighed around 200 lbs by now. A bell rang, and a few seconds later, one of the buttlers that looked like Mario came in. "Breakfeast for miss Lalia", he said. "Pen-cakes prepared per your preferences! Heavy cream and extra butter!" The man moved a cart full of food with him. Lalia leaned at the bed, licking her lips, her big boos pressing against a pile. "Only one extra?", she asked with a sexy voice. "Don't toy with me like last time. You know I want that hot stack trenched from bottom to top", she reminded the man. "Oh yeah. Come to mama!", she said, her tongue hanging out. She placed her boobs on the cart, so that the man had to look into her cleavage, but he didn't seem to react to it. "I'm gaining weight just from the smell", she said with her tongue hanging out. "Let's see if you can load up another cart before this calorie bomb is inside me", she said with hunger in her eyes. "Right away miss" - "In fact call in the whole fleet. Today I just want to lay in, and get huge. "

Two hours later, the carts were summing up in front of Lalia's room. And yet more cart's were there to come.
"Come on boys, I'm building a belly up to the heavens!" The girl belched loudly. "Just look at this amount of food." She lay in bed, her belly sticking out like 180 centimeters from her torso. The lower half of her belly, was naked under her chemise, while her boobs were exposed, because the dress had ripped. "All right! It's no Everest, but you could act a little impressed", she said, pointing at the top of her giant stomach. "Someone should take a picture of this."
111.title: A few days later

1112.content: A few days later in the morning, Lalia laied in the same red bed. She wore the same golden chemise. Still her arms and face looked like ever before. She was still sleeping. In front of her face, there were two roundings in the carpenter, due to her boobs having grown again because of her constant gain. She now had an I-cup size, of 110 centimeters. That resulted in the upper part, being a bit tight. By now you could call her chubby. Her butt was sticking out, and Lalia did nothing to avoid this, even though, she was around 220 lbs. A She rang the bell. "Breakfast! I'm starving!", she shouted. A second later, the usual carts full of pancakes came in. She didn't even talk to the people, carrying in her meals, but dug in right away. "Is everything to your liking, Miss?", one of the kitchen-staff members asked. In between mouths full of food, she mumbled: "I think so." The girl didn't even have to move. She just layed on her stomach, while her long tongue put the pancakes into her mouth, and she gorged them down. Slowly her dress became tighter in the mid-section. Her belly grew again, and soon she laid on a small bowl of food. The constant eating had taken quite an impact on her appetite. When her tongue couldn't reach the food anymore, she began to use her arms, to stuff the delicious treats into her mouth. Earlier than usual, her ass reached the top of her bed. That was when her arms couldn't reach the food anymore. "Ah, that was a good one", she said to herself, while she looked at the giant belly under her. "I can't believe I was ever worried about getting fat", she thought to herself. "It makes my roundings much more feminine and allows me to stuff whenever I want to. A good full stomach is just a good feeling." With that, she began messaging the parts of her giant gut, that she was able to reach. The next hours after the binge, only were about laying there and waiting until the giant meat-ball that was her belly, shrunk down, so she could move again. Which in her case, always took a little time.
1112.title: Another day of laying in bed

11121.content: It was around mid-day at another day, when Lalia decided to go to the beach. She had had a great breakfast binge earlier that day, which resulted in quite a big, round belly, that was about to hang a little. She decided to put on a yellow bikini. In the tight slip, her ghetto booty was even more visible, but she didn't care, because she loved her curvy body. She took out the top, but she soon notice she had problems, knotting it at the bag, But after a few tries, the top was put on. It dug deeply into her breast flesh, because it was to small. She noticed it was smaller than before. What she didn't know yet, was that her boobs had grown a J-cup. She went out of the room. Every man she saw, staired at her big tits, that were bouncing with every little step. Almost all of them, even turned around to watch her butt wobble. When she had left the house, she saw the beach yet. The red-head became overjoied, and began to run, causing her boobs to bounce wildly and her butt to wobble even more. Her visible belly jiggled with every step. A the beach, she layed down on her towel. The sun was shining on this beautiful summer-day. "I'll better be putting on some lotion, or I'll get burned", she said loudly. She laied down on the floor, her boobs being pressed to the ground. Just then, she saw Mr. M walk by. "Hey, Lalia", he said. "Isn't this a beautifull day?", he asked, with his usual smile on his face. "Hey, Mr. M. How good you're here. It's difficult to reach my back, you know? So don't you want to put some lotion on me?", she asked, giving him a girlish smile. "It would be an honour, Miss Lalia", said the musceled man, that only wore shorts. So he started creaming her back with lotion. The red-haired girl let out moans of pleasure, as Mr. M creamed her whole back side. When he was finished, Lalia said: "Thanks sir." She turned around, looking at her boobs. "If you two grow any bigger", the girl told her boobs "I'll need a bottle of sountain for each of you!" That made her giggle. She began creaming her boobs. When she was finished, she stood up, and went swimming. She ran to the sea. Mr. M just stould there. "Lalia, what a beautiful girl you are. And with every day you become more beautiful", he thought. Lalia swam in the water with joy. With every move, her whole body was shaking. At some point, a few hours later. Mr. M came to her. "I think it's time for dinner. Don't you think so?", he asked. Lalia nodded, and so the left for the house.
11121.title: At the beach another day

111212.content: When she stould up antoher day, Lalia decided to try on some of her clothings. The girl had gained weight again. The most noticable thing, when you looked at her form the front, was that she had grown a K-cup which meant that her boobs were now hanging all over her belly, down to her wide, womanly hips, when she didn't wear a bra. Her belly had only grown a little, but was now hanging a little, even on an empty stomach. Her butt had also grown, sticking out. At first she out on the green pullover, withe the white stripe at her bust, and the blue jeans she had worn to it. Lalia struggled to pull the pullover over her huge bust, and when she finally had managed to do so, she was automatically tummy-free. She took out the blue jeans, but wasn't able to pull them over her bigger butt. "Hm, might try on another one", she said to herself. Next, she put on the blue blouse, she had always worn to college. She buttoned it bit after bit, and it sit all snug. But when she reached her bust, she could forget it. "Hey, the twins must have become very big", she thought. Just then, the other buttons flew of one by one, because her belly needed his room. Thar made her giggle.
111212.title: Troubles with the clothing

1112121.content: Next thing she tried on, was the blue shirt with free shoulders and a plugging neckline, she ahd worn for the bake club. She showed huge cleavage and the shirt was extremely tight and her tummy was exposed, but it fit. When she tried on the trousers, she was not able to pull them over her ghetto-booty. She tried and tried, but after some time, they just ripped off. So Lalia put on her white elastic trouser, and they fit like before. Just than, one of the little men came in. "Time for lunch miss Lalia", he said. "I'll be there right away", replied Lalia. Lalia went through the house, until she reached the hall for lunch. There was a table, and on the table were all kinds of food, one could imagine. "So let's get on the feast", she thougt. "How good that I'm wearing elastics", she thought.
1112121.title: Clothes that fit...sort of

11121211.content: As she had done many times before, Lalia went to a chair at the front of the table, and sat down. She noticed that the chair was pressing against her butt, but didn't worry. First thing she took, was a plate of potatoes. She just opened her mouth, and they flew down her throat. Next she took to hamburgers, which she managed to eat with two bites each. Normal people would have been satisfied by now, but Lalila had only just begun. There wasn't even a slight bulge visible in her belly. "Hm, what's next? It all looks so delicious", Lalia thought. Than she grabed a plate were a mountain of small cake was on. Cake after cake disappeared in her belly. "Hm, that was a good appetizer", the girl said loudly to herself. Than Laila noticed some Pizzas at the table. She leaned back a little, and stuffed on them. "Quality over quantity is a false dichotomy", she thought. "Even though the quality is excellent either. Than Laila spotted some apple and cherry cakes. "It's what always used to eat when I was with Jane", she thought. "If she would be there, she'd tell me to stop eating and gaining like that...But than this wouldn't be so much fun anymore." So Laila dug in. She moved to the fridge near her, and took out a large box of ice-cream. "Hm, so delicious", thought the redhead. Fiveteen minutes later, about twenty big empty boxes of icecream laied around Laila. "You know what would come pretty good with this? Some icecream", she thought. Just when she leaned over, to reach for the icecream, her white elastic trousers ripped at the front, than the chair gave in but she just ignored it. "For the gallons I ate, these trousers were a must have, but they didn't really help. Oh I just love myself!" Than Laila spotted some pastries. She ate one after one. "I like that heavy landing", she thought once more. Laila spread her legs, because the weight of her enormous belly became too much for her. So it just rested on the floor. "What's this", she thought. Her fine nose smelled something. Than she saw it: pancakes. "Oh come to mama", she exclaimed. And there they were brought. One cart after another, packed with pancakes, each one having two plates, with mountains of pancakes, each one a height of about half a meter. "Practically, I'm not hungry anymore, but it's all so delicious", she said. And so one after another went into her mouth. When Laila noticed there was nothing left anymore, she just fell asleep.
11121211.title: Stuffing to it's limits

111212112.content:
It was one of the usual evenings in the Lap of Luxory. Laila just laid in her big red bed. She had eaten dinner half an hour ago, and her belly was in the process of getting smaller. again. Suddenly, someone knocked on her door. "Oh, are there any leftovers from the dessert?", she thought. She laied down on her side, to see who entered the door. She wore the usual yellow dress with the huge cleavage. One of the little men with the brown hairs and a mustache entered. "Miss Lalia, Mr. M would like to see you. He would like to ask you for a dance", said the little man. Laila was surprised, but then she thought: "He has done good to me all the days. Why not dancing with him?" "Tell Mr. M that I will come down in half an hour", she said. Lalia got up. She had gained a little weight again in the last few days. She was now at 235lbs. Those five lbs had nearly gone all to her boobs, which resulted in her tits going up another cup-size. They now were a L-cup. Laila went to the cupboard, and took out a corset and the yellow robe that she had worn at parties when she had been at home. "Oh home... Holidays must be over in a few days. I'll have to ask M if he can bring me back home. Otherwise Jane will be worried", she thought to herself. She put on the corset, which somehow fit, and made her belly seem to be very flat, in contrast to her massive butt and huge rack.

She went down, and saw Mr. M. They were dancing for about an hour, and Mr.M complimented about how beautiful she was. "Mr. M", she said. "Even though I really like you and all this. I'm pretty sure this can not go on forever. You know I love to eat, but I miss my friends. Especially Jane. I would like to return back home." "I can understand this, and I won't be there to hold you back, because I told you, that the fulflilment of your desires is my talent. But be assured, that you can always come back here", he said. "Thank you for everything. I will think about coming back, but first I'll have to finish college, and pass finals. They're killer!", she said, getting a bit sad. "I think I'll be able to help you with this problem. Don't ask me how. But if you practise hard enough, I'll do anything to help you. It's the least I can do, for the weeks of pleasure I got while you were here", said Mr. M. Laila blushed. A few days later, Laila entered the white stretch-limousine again, and headed for her hometown. Jane, Matt and his friends were already waiting and practicing for finals to begin, but that's another story...

THE END
111212112.title: Dancing with Mr. M and Laila's Journey back home

The rules were simple each round the contestants would be given a new dish to eat whoever lasted the longest without getting full won.

The bell rang and the contest started and Lalia chowed down easily clearing the first five rounds it took before someone dropped out. After that more and more of the contestants started dropping out has the rounds went on but the meals no matter how generous couldn't make a dent in Lalia's appetite.

After over a dozen rounds it became apparent that...

122221.content:
After another half hour of gorging themselves the little girl stopped eating pushing away her plate.
"I give up." The girl said quietly.
Lalia looked at the little girl inquisitively. While she was hardly an expert on the topic the pigtailed little tyke didn't exactly look full. She didn't look queasy or sluggish at least not anymore sluggish then one would expect from someone hauling around a gut more than twice the size of a bowling ball.
Lalia's train of thought was derailed when she was called over by the contest holder to receive her prize. She took her money and on a whim decided to talk to the little girl it wasn't every day she met someone with an appetite like her own after all.

She walked up to the little girl who was walking awkwardly to accommodate her swollen stomach and as she approached it was clear that...

choices: Lalia offers to take the girl to a restaurant.
The girl storms off before Lalia can respond.
1222211.content:
The little girl was mad, frowning as she saw Lalia walk up to her.
"Look lady just because I gave up doesn't mean you won not really. I only called it quits because if my belly got much bigger it would be for me to walk around. Nobody died he wanted me." The girl said slapping the side of the for emphasis and causing it to jiggle.

Lalia was a bit taken aback at the girl's anger but wasn't to discourage it wasn't often she met somebody with a appetite even approaching her's and she wasn't going to give up this chance to meet and maybe make friends with a fellow glutton.
1222211.title: She was mad at Lalia for beating her.

info.brief_description: Since CC has stopped continuing the story of Lalia I thought it was time to continue.
info.description:
Craving Control was a cartoon placed at deviant art about a sexy girl and her stuffings/weight gain. Since CC has stopped continuing the story of Lalia I thought it was time to further the story. I decided to take the last story he had left unfinished, which was entitled "The Lap of Luxory". It was about Laila, going on holiday a few weeks before finals. She pigs out and meets a man, who is willing to fullfill her desires, which would be eating. The story was left unfinished, when Lalia was at the Lap of Luxory. I will start with the first four pages of the comic, as the first four chapters of my story. From thereon, you're free to write whatever you want. But I'll also leave a second choice, that does not have to follow the original storyline.
Make her belly as big as you want, but don't let her gain that much in one sitting. Please write long chapter. Feel free to add anything.
